articles.title: Ecuador says it has no evidence that survivor of a US strike in the Caribbean committed any crime - AP News
articles.description: The survivor of a U.S. strike on a submersible vessel accused by the Trump administration of transporting drugs in the Caribbean has been released by prosecutors in Ecuador. They said they had no evidence that he committed any crime in the South American nati…

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Horror sequel 'Black Phone 2' dials up a No. 1 opening - NBC News
articles.description: The horror sequel “Black Phone 2” topped the North American box office charts this weekend with $26.5 million in ticket sales, according to studio estimates Sunday.
articles.content: The horror sequel Black Phone 2 topped the North American box office charts this weekend with $26.5 million in ticket sales, according to studio estimates Sunday. Not only did it surpass the original… [+4355 chars]
